buys.news_summary: Should Investors Revisit Alexandria Real Estate Equities After a 50% Drop in 2025?

news.headline: Should Investors Revisit Alexandria Real Estate Equities After a 50% Drop in 2025?
news.article_text:
Our Discounted Cash Flow (DCF) analysis suggests Alexandria Real Estate Equities is undervalued by 49.1%. Track this in your watchlist or portfolio , or discover 841 more undervalued stocks based on cash flows .

Applying this two-stage DCF model, the estimated intrinsic value of Alexandria Real Estate Equities comes to $106.01 per share. The current market valuation results in a significant discount of 49.1% versus this projection, meaning the shares trade well below the DCF-based fair value.

news.headline: S&P 500 Advances Weekly Amid Gains in Information Technology, Consumer Discretionary
news.summary: The Standard & Poor's 500 index rose more than 0.7% this week. The information technology and biotech sector led the way.

news.headline: These Were the S&P 500’s Best and Worst Stocks in October
news.summary: The ChatGPT maker plans to deploy 6 gigawatts worth of AMD chips in exchange for up to 160 million shares of AMD stock.  The deal propelled AMD shares to their best month since 2001, according to Dow Jones Market Data.  Micron Technology  continued its banner year in October, with shares rising 34% for the month.

news.headline: Why Alexandria Real Estate Equities Was Diving This Week
news.summary: Alexandria Real Estate Equities (ARE 3.05%) has lost 27% of its value week to date. One analyst felt compelled to downgrade the stock soon after it published quarterly earnings. Management lowered adjusted FFO guidance to $9.01 for the entirety of 2025.
news.article_text:
One analyst felt compelled to downgrade the stock soon after it published quarterly earnings.

A disappointing quarterly earnings report and an analyst's recommendation downgrade combined to put the hurt on Alexandria Real Estate Equities (ARE 3.05%) stock over the past few trading days. According to data compiled by S&P Global Market Intelligence, shares of the real estate investment trust (REIT) had shed over 27% of their value week to date as of early Friday morning.

Third-quarter tumbles

T

news.headline: Alexandria Real Estate Equities Inc (ARE) Q3 2025 Earnings Call Highlights: Navigating ...
news.summary: Alexandria Real Estate Equities Inc (NYSE:ARE) has a strong balance sheet with over $4 billion in liquidity. Same-property NOI was down 6% for the quarter, primarily driven by lower occupancy.
news.article_text:
This article first appeared on GuruFocus.

FFO per Share (Diluted, as Adjusted): $2.22 for Q3 2025.

Occupancy: Down 1.1% for the quarter; ended at 90.6%.

Leasing Volume: 1.2 million square feet for the quarter.

Rental Rate Growth: 15.2% on renewals and re-leasing; 6.1% on a cash basis.

Same-Property NOI: Down 6% overall; down 3.1% on a cash basis.

Adjusted EBITDA Margin: 71% for the most recent quarter.

G&A Cost as Percentage of NOI: 5.7% trailing 12-months.

Liquidity: $4.2 billion.

Net
